translation.en: Oh my God.
Hey, Nick. I was just thinking about your lovely wife.
translation.it: Ehi, Nick! Stavo pensando alla tua adorabile moglie.

translation.en: Oh, you again.
I see you've already met Francisco.
And I guess you're both acquainted with Vikram's harpy of a sister.
translation.it: E anche quell'arpia della sorella di Vikram.

translation.en: -Did he say "herpe"? -Harpy.
Countess! How humiliating it must be for you to see Claudette
translation.it: Contessa! Dev'essere umiliante per te vedere Claudette

translation.en: actually close a deal with the Maharajah.
Ever wonder what you might have done wrong, dear?
translation.it: Ti sei chiesta cos'hai fatto di male?

translation.en: Ever wonder what it feels like to be tall enough to ride a rollercoaster?
translation.it: Tu ti chiedi mai come sarebbe avere l'altezza per le montagne russe?

translation.en: That's Countess Sekou.
She's Vik's ex-fiancée, and she's Claudette's old university roommate.
translation.it: L'ex fidanzata di Vik ed ex coinquilina di Claudette all'università.

translation.en: And they're still friends? She's quite rude, by the way.
translation.it: E sono ancora amiche? Piuttosto maleducata, comunque.

translation.en: Well, on top of all that, she's also Claudette's maid of honor.
translation.it: Non solo, è anche la damigella d'onore di Claudette.

translation.en: -[Audrey] What? -Yeah.
[man over PA] Hope you watched the video because the dancing is about to begin!
translation.it: Spero che abbiate guardato il video, perché è l'ora del balletto.

translation.en: -What dancing? -I'm gonna fake going to the bathroom.
translation.it: - Che balletto? - Fingo di andare in bagno.

translation.en: -I don't dance. You dance. -I didn't get a video. Did you?
translation.it: - Balla tu. - Non ho il video.

translation.en: They brought one to the room.
-I forgot to tell you. -Thanks.
translation.it: Mi sono dimenticato di dartelo. - Grazie. - Ti amo.

translation.en: [man over PA] Ladies and gentlemen, please help me welcome the bride!
translation.it: Signore e signori, diamo un caloroso benvenuto alla sposa!

translation.en: Come with us!
All right, come on!
-Come on, baby! -[screams]
[over PA] And now it's time!
The moment you've all been waiting for.
The groom, Vikram Govindan!
This is crazy!
Brother!
Back! Get everybody back! Get everybody back!
[guard] Stay back!
-[Nick] Okay, all right. -[Claudette shrieks]
[Claudette] Is he dead?
It's not him. It's not Vik.
translation.it: Non è lui. Non è Vik.

translation.en: Oh, thank God! It's only Mr. Lou.
translation.it: Grazie a Dio! È Mister Lou.

translation.en: -Who did this to you? -[Claudette] Where is Vik? Hey!
translation.it: - Chi è stato? - Dov'è Vik? Ehi! Chi? Come? Oddio!

translation.en: [Audrey] Who? What? Oh my gosh!
Where is Vik?
-Who did this to you? -Who was it? Do you remember?
translation.it: - Chi ti ha fatto questo? - Chi? Ricordi?

translation.en: It was…
[Nick] Say it. Say it. Don't die. Don't die!
-[Audrey] Oh my gosh! -[Claudette] Where is Vik?
[guard 1] Clear! Clear! Come on!
-Come on! Come on! Come on! Go! -[guard 2] Clear!
-[Nick] This is a distraction. -[Audrey] From what?
translation.it: È una distrazione. - Da cosa? - Dalla fuga!

translation.en: From the escape!
-[Colonel] Are you serious? -[shutter clicks] What do you mean all communication systems are down?
translation.it: Mi prendi in giro? Sistemi di comunicazione fuori uso?

translation.en: Get them up and running!
We have a security officer compromised. We need medical attention immediately.
translation.it: Un agente di sicurezza è compromesso. Servono cure mediche.

translation.en: [sighs] Okay.
[Vik] Help!
Yo, you hatin’ hard on me right now, son!
translation.it: Non ci… Mi fai male, bello.

translation.en: -Homeboy! -[Vik] Nick!
[Vik yelling] Nick!
This is some janky-ass shit!
[Colonel] Lock down the island
until the security cameras are back online.
All guests are to remain in their rooms.
Oh my God. We need to get ahead of this, or our shares will plummet.
translation.it: Oddio, se non risolviamo le azioni crolleranno.

translation.en: My brother could be dead and the only thing you're concerned about are share prices?
translation.it: Mio fratello potrebbe essere morto e ti preoccupi delle azioni?

translation.en: How do you think our investors will react when news of this gets out, you little Miss Minority Shareholder?
translation.it: Come credi reagiranno i nostri investitori alla notizia, Miss Azionista di Minoranza?

translation.en: Giving all her money to save the whales and heal the planet and all that nonsense.
translation.it: Che dona tutto per salvare le balene e curare il pianeta e altre sciocchezze.

translation.en: Colonel. Where is Vik?
Where is my husband?
[Colonel] We will find him. We will find him.
The Maharajah's been kidnapped.
-What? -[Countess] Oh my God!
-Where did they take him? -[Nick] He's alive.
Somebody with a machine gun threw him on a boat, and they took off.
translation.it: Uno col mitra l'ha buttato su una barca e sono fuggiti.

translation.en: -How many kidnappers? -[Nick] One.
Which means his partner is still here on the island.
translation.it: Il complice è ancora qui sull'isola.

translation.en: Hold on. How do you know there were two?
If the kidnapper had Vik and was taking him to the boat…
translation.it: Se il rapitore stava portando Vik alla barca…

translation.en: Ah, someone else was leading the elephant into the tent.
-Thank you. -There are 400 people on this island.
That's a lot of suspects. Let us narrow it down for you, okay, Colonel?
translation.it: - Sono parecchi sospetti. - Restringiamo il campo, ok?

translation.en: Claudette, how many people knew about the elephant being part of the ceremony?
translation.it: Claudette, quanti sapevano dell'elefante alla cerimonia?

translation.en: Just the board.
Yeah, we had to sign off at the expense of transporting an elephant.
translation.it: Abbiamo dovuto firmare le spese di trasporto.

translation.en: So that means all of you.
What are you implying?
I think it's very obvious what I'm implying.
translation.it: Mi pare sia piuttosto ovvio cosa insinuo.

translation.en: -[Nick] Mm-hmm. -One of you is an accomplice to a murder.
translation.it: Uno di voi è complice di un omicidio.

translation.en: -That is ridiculous! -I'm not on the board!
Is it? You all hated my brother!
translation.it: Ah, sì? Odiavate tutti mio fratello.

translation.en: What? No, I… I love Vik.
[scoffs] Oh, please!
-You've never forgiven me. -For what?
translation.it: - Non mi hai mai perdonato. - Per cosa?

translation.en: -Breaking up your engagement. -Oh, get over yourself.
It was an arranged marriage between our families.
translation.it: Era un matrimonio combinato tra le nostre famiglie.

translation.en: We amicably split in order to allow for your so-called "love marriage."
translation.it: Ci siamo lasciati di comune accordo per il vostro "matrimonio d'amore".

translation.en: You didn't want this marriage to go through so you kidnapped him!
translation.it: Non volevi questo matrimonio e l'hai rapito!

translation.en: You gold-digging--
-Ladies, stop it! -Calm down, everybody!
translation.it: - Arrampicatrice che non… - Signore, basta. Calmatevi tutti!

translation.en: -We do this for a living. It's what we do. -[Nick] It's our thing.
translation.it: - Noi lo facciano di mestiere. - Già, è così.

translation.en: -And this is not just another case. -No.
translation.it: - Non è solo un caso. - No.

translation.en: -[Nick] This is personal. -[Audrey] Yeah, it's Vik.
translation.it: - È personale. - Si tratta di Vik.

translation.en: -[Nick] He means a lot to us. -[Audrey] So we'll find out who did this.
translation.it: - È importante per noi. - Troveremo i responsabili.

translation.en: -[Nick] A hundred percent. -[Audrey] And find out why they did this.
translation.it: - Al 100%. - E scopriremo il movente. Sì.

translation.en: And we're gonna get Vik back, okay?
We're gonna do this for the low, low price of $25 million.
translation.it: Alla modica cifra di 25 milioni di dollari.

translation.en: Twenty-five mil, honey. I swear to God.
[Nick] I would've settled for ten grand. So insane.
translation.it: - Avrei accettato 10.000. - Cosa costa quella cifra?

translation.en: What are you doing?
[Nick] I'm blocking the door so no one can get in.
translation.it: Blocco la porta così non entrano.

translation.en: [Audrey] Honey, you're gonna hurt your back.
You know what would hurt my back? A knife going through it.
translation.it: Sai cosa fa male alla schiena? Una pugnalata.

translation.en: The killer knows we're on to him. We're on the next-to-kill list. I guarantee it.
translation.it: Sa che lo stiamo cercando. Siamo le prossime vittime, garantito.

translation.en: What happened to Vik? A guy that rich gets kidnapped for the money.
translation.it: - Cos'è successo a Vik? - Lo avranno rapito per soldi.

translation.en: There's no profit in hurting him.
Oh God. We're not gonna be invited anywhere ever again. Ever again.
translation.it: Oddio, non ci inviterà più nessuno. Mai più.

translation.en: The cheese has a hold on me, honey. I can't stop.
Are you just… Will you take a slice like a civilized person?
translation.it: Ma come mangi? Taglialo come le persone normali.

translation.en: I don't know where the knife is.
translation.it: - Non trovo il coltello. - Oh, Gesù.

translation.en: -Oh Jesus! -[Nick] What? You got a headache?
translation.it: - Non trovo il coltello. - Oh, Gesù. Hai mal di testa?

translation.en: -Yes! -[Nick] I'm sorry.
-How's your back? -My back's killing me.
-I'll get Advil. -Please. Please.
-I'm gonna get more cheese in me. -Honey, do not eat all that cheese.
translation.it: - Ingerisco altro formaggio. - Non mangiarne troppo.

translation.en: That affects… You're terrible all night.
translation.it: Lo sai che di notte la sconti.

translation.en: -Absolutely. -Oh.
And I have pictures from the tent of a burned robe with bloodstains.
translation.it: E alla tenda ho scattato delle foto a una veste bruciata e insanguinata.

translation.en: Someone was trying to get rid of the evidence, and I'm sure it was the elephant handler.
translation.it: Volevano sbarazzarsi delle prove. L'addestratore di elefanti.

translation.en: Good detecting, sweetheart.
-I'm doing my best. Here. -[Nick] Okay. Thank you.
-[Audrey] One, two, three, four. -[Nick] Okay.
[Nick] I gotta move this stuff now?
What if that's the killer?
-Killers don't knock. -What if it's housekeeping?
We… We're good! We don't need any towels.
translation.it: Siamo a posto. Non ci servono asciugamani.

translation.en: No! No! We do need towels. Leave 'em out front, please!
translation.it: Sì, invece. Li lasci alla porta, grazie.

translation.en: We've been here ten minutes. You need more towels?
You use 30 towels after every shower.
I'm sorry. At least I shower.
All right, you got me there.
[Francisco] It's me, Francisco!
Wait, wait, wait. What if he's the killer?
The only thing he wants to murder is your hm-hm!
Hey!
-[Francisco] Hurry! There's no time! -[Nick] Be right there!
-[Audrey] We're hurrying! -[Nick] We know!
So sorry.
-[Nick] Hey. -Hey.
-You. -[Nick] Mm-hmm.
Gorgeous.
[Nick] Jesus Christ. All right.
[Audrey] Put this back. You said hurry. What's… How can we help?
translation.it: Rimettiamoli lì. Hai detto di sbrigarci. Che possiamo fare?

translation.en: -I have information. -[Nick] Yes.
Everyone thinks Claudette is this gold digger,
but what's not so well known is the fact that, as a precaution,
translation.it: ma non tutti sanno che, per precauzione,

translation.en: the board made her sign a brutal prenup.
translation.it: il consiglio le ha fatto firmare un accordo spietato.

translation.en: So that means if Vik divorces her, she's left with nothin'.
translation.it: Quindi se Vik le chiede il divorzio, lei non avrà niente.

translation.en: -I gotta move this shit again? -Wait. Wait. Who is it?
translation.it: - Devo spostare tutto? - Aspetta. Chi è?

translation.en: [Claudette] It's Claudette. You must hear what I have to say.
translation.it: Sono Claudette. Dovete starmi a sentire.

translation.en: Okay, one second. Let's get you in the closet.
translation.it: Ok, un secondo! Nell'armadio. Su, entraci.

translation.en: [Nick] Okay, be right there. I gotta get some cheese.
-Okay. Just go in there. -[rock scraping floor]
No! Get off of… Jesus!
-Coming, Claudette! -Sorry! One second.
[Nick] Hurry!
-[Audrey] Hello, Claudette. -[Nick] Hi.
[Claudette] They all think I'm marrying Vik just for the money, especially the Countess.
translation.it: Pensano che sposi Vik per i soldi, soprattutto la contessa.

translation.en: She's been jealous of me ever since we met.
translation.it: È gelosa di me da sempre.

translation.en: -Really? I can imagine why. -I can imagine.
But still, she was my best friend.
translation.it: Ma era comunque la mia migliore amica.

translation.en: -Right. -[Nick] Sure.
-You know? -Yeah.
-We were so close. -[Audrey] Oh!
And I think I just miss her sometimes.
translation.it: E credo che a volte mi manchi.

translation.en: -Oh, sorry. -[Claudette sobbing]
-I just wanna know who kidnapped my Vik. -Mm-hmm.
translation.it: Voglio solo sapere chi ha rapito il mio Vik.

translation.en: They all have something to gain from this.
-Terrible. -[Claudette] I can't trust any of them!
translation.it: - Terribile. - Non mi fido di nessuno.

translation.en: -[whispers] There's a gun. -A gun?
[Claudette] The Colonel, so bitter about his demotion.
translation.it: Il colonnello non ha gradito il demansionamento.

translation.en: Saira, always starved for attention.
And Vik had just discovered Francisco's dark secret.
translation.it: E Vik aveva appena scoperto l'oscuro segreto di Francisco.

translation.en: -[Audrey] What? -[Nick] He had a secret?
-Oh! -[Nick] Oh God.
-[Audrey] We don't need to do that. -[Nick] That's cool.
translation.it: - Non credo sia necessario. - È tutto ok.

translation.en: Who is it?
It's Saira. Let me in.
Uh, okay. One second.
-I need to hide. The closet! -No, no, no!
-[Nick] It's too dark. -Here. Come on.
translation.it: No, troppo buio e ci sono le sue cose.

translation.en: -[Nick] She has all her stuff. -One second, Saira!
translation.it: No, troppo buio e ci sono le sue cose. Un attimo, Saira!

translation.en: [Nick] Coming! Be right there!
Okay, gotta get to you!
-So sorry. One second. -Moving around some stuff for fun!
-I know who you need to be looking at. -[Nick] Who?
translation.it: - So su chi dovete concentrarvi. - Chi?

translation.en: -Claudette! -[Nick] Claudette?
[Saira] I told Vik she was bad news the minute I met her.
translation.it: Ho sempre detto a Vik che non mi convinceva.

translation.en: She's suspicious, narcissistic, manipulative, and looks cheap as well in that red dress--
translation.it: È sospettosa, narcisista, manipolatrice e quel vestito rosso…

translation.en: Excuse me! I'm so sorry to interrupt, but I feel like I'd be a rude hostess
translation.it: Scusa tanto se ti interrompo, ma sarei davvero scortese

translation.en: if I didn't offer you a piece of this exquisite artisan cheese that's…
translation.it: se non ti offrissi un pezzo di formaggio artigianale…

translation.en: Nick, where's this… Where's that cheese? The big--
translation.it: Nick, dov'è… Dov'è il formaggio? Il pezzo…

translation.en: -The cheese is gone. -Where is it?
I put it, uh, in my stomach.
You ate that entire block of cheese?
Trying to shame me. I don't know if that's gonna get the cheese back--
translation.it: Farmi sentire in colpa non lo farà tornare.

translation.en: I'm sorry. I don't mean to be selfish--
Sorry. Hold on. You know what? Let me give you a drink right now just to relax you a little bit.
translation.it: Un attimo, sai una cosa? Fatti un bicchierino per rilassarti.

translation.en: -Here. -I… I don't want that.
-No? Okay. -I'm okay.
-Oh shit. -[Saira] Who is it?
translation.it: Oh, merda. - Chi è? - Non saprei.

translation.en: -[Audrey] Not sure. -You expecting someone?
It's like an after-party. People just show up.
translation.it: È un dopo-festa. La gente si presenta.

translation.en: Let's put you into the bedroom, just in case, 'cause I don't know.
translation.it: Per sicurezza vai in camera da letto. Non si sa mai.

translation.en: -I'll hide there. -Don't hide in there! Why? That's an obvious spot.
translation.it: - Mi nascondo lì. - Ma no, è troppo ovvio.

translation.en: -[Audrey] Is it hot in here? -I'm hot too.
translation.it: - Non senti caldo? - Sì. - Nasconditi, tesoro. - Arrivo.

translation.en: -I'm coming! -[knocking continues]
What if that is the killer?
Don't you kinda want it to be the killer so they can kill us? I am sick of this shit.
translation.it: Non vorresti che lo fosse, così ci uccide? Mi sono rotto il cazzo.

translation.en: -Baby, I do not feel very good. -[rock scraping]
What's doin'? Yeah?
Hey, great to see you.
What's going on? [chuckles lightly]
[Countess] I know who did it.
Who?
It was Francisco.
Francisco!
He has had over 85 paternity suits filed against him.
translation.it: Ci sono oltre 85 cause di paternità contro di lui.

translation.en: We suspect he's been siphoning money out of the company in order to pay for all of these babies he made.
translation.it: Sospettiamo sottragga denaro all'azienda per pagare tutti questi figli.

translation.en: That's a lie!
Not the part about the babies.
Yes, that's true. I've spread my seed far and wide,
translation.it: ho sparso il mio seme in lungo e in largo,

translation.en: but I have never stolen in my life.
translation.it: ma non ho mai rubato in vita mia!

translation.en: -What are you doing here? -An excellent question.
translation.it: - Che ci fai qui? - Ottima domanda.

translation.en: -What are you all doing here? -Saira's here.
translation.it: - Che ci fate tutti qui? - C'è anche Saira.

translation.en: -Nobody move! -Oh my God!
translation.it: - Che nessuno si muova! - Oh, mio Dio!

translation.en: I ain't moving.
It's mine. It's mine.
-I missed it. -[Nick] Missed the call?
I have a message.
[distorted voice] We have the Maharajah.
If you contact the authorities, he dies.
We'll make our demands known to you at 7:00 a.m.
That voice is hysterical. You got to admit it.
translation.it: La voce fa molto ridere, ammettiamolo.

translation.en: So we should all stay here. Correct, Colonel?
Because one of us is definitely working with the kidnapper.
translation.it: Uno di noi è sicuramente complice dei rapitori.

translation.en: Yeah. Motives, opportunities.
Somebody here. My head is spinning a little bit.
translation.it: Qualcuno in questa stanza. Mi gira un po' la testa.

translation.en: Honey?
Babe, are you taking a nap? I'm tired, too, so let's, uh…
translation.it: Tesoro, fai un pisolino? Anch'io ho sonno, quindi…

translation.en: Nobody leave here until we figure out who did what.
translation.it: Nessuno se ne vada finché non capiamo.

translation.en: It's great to see everybody. -Thanks for coming over. Sorry, my bad. -[Francisco] Whoa!
translation.it: È stato bello vedervi. Grazie della visita.

translation.en: [yelps] Jesus! What?
Oh my God. Nick?
-[Nick] Yeah. -Nick?
[Nick] Yeah?
-[Audrey] Nick! -Uh-huh.
Nicky, honey. Get up. Get up! We got roofied.
translation.it: Nicky, tesoro, svegliati. Ci hanno drogato.

translation.en: -What happened? -[Audrey] Baby. Oh my God! We fell asleep!
translation.it: - Che è successo? - Oddio… Ci siamo addormentati.

translation.en: -[Nick] Oh yeah? -Honey! [Nick] We're sleeping now.
I don't know what happened. Uh, I…
-Come on! Get up, Nick! -[Nick] Okay. Up. I'm up.
translation.it: - Alzati, Nick! - Ok, sono in piedi.

translation.en: [Audrey] Who did this?
[Nick] What? Now they're just showing off.
-[Audrey] Hurry up! -[Nick] Okay, I'm coming, honey. So…
-[Audrey] Get up! -[Nick] I'm up!
-Calm down before you say anything. -Nobody drugs us and gets away with it!
translation.it: - Calmati. - Chi ci ha drogato non la passerà liscia.

translation.en: -Maybe they didn't drug us. -It's illegal!
translation.it: - Forse non ci hanno drogati. - È illegale!

translation.en: Maybe we just ate too much.
translation.it: - Forse non ci hanno drogati. - È illegale! Forse abbiamo mangiato troppo.

translation.en: -That's why we passed out. -Nick. Audrey. Just in time.
translation.it: Forse abbiamo mangiato troppo. Nick, Audrey. Appena in tempo.

translation.en: -For what? -For what?
The real detectives have just arrived.
[Colonel] Connor Miller.
-[Audrey gasps] -Former MI6 hostage negotiator.
Oh my God. Specializes in high-profile cases.
translation.it: Oddio. Specializzato in casi di alto profilo.

translation.en: He got the President of Uruguay's son back from the cartel. -He wrote the book. He wrote the book. -On what?
translation.it: Ha fatto liberare il figlio del presidente uruguaiano e ha scritto il libro.

translation.en: How Rogaine doesn't work for everybody?
translation.it: Quello sui trapianti di capelli falliti?

translation.en: The book! Our course detective book!
translation.it: No, quello per l'esame da detective.

translation.en: [Miller] Greetings. I hear you need a case solved.
translation.it: Saluti. So che avete un caso da risolvere.

translation.en: Colonel. Been a long time.
Big fan.
-Oh. -Hey.
Mr. Miller, we're also very big fans. Um, we can bring you up to speed.
translation.it: Signor Miller, anche noi siamo suoi fan. La aggiorno.

translation.en: So what we know already is that this is at least a two-person job.
translation.it: Sappiamo che sono coinvolte almeno due persone.

translation.en: I saw the first guy escape with Vik on a boat,
translation.it: Ho visto il primo fuggire con Vik su una barca,

translation.en: leaving the second guy still on the island.
Also, just so you know, we were both drugged last night.
translation.it: E per sua informazione, ieri ci hanno drogati.

translation.en: I don't know if we were drugged. We did have a few drinks--
translation.it: Non so se sia così. Abbiamo bevuto…

translation.en: -You must be the Spitzes. -Yes.
Yes, we are!
Your reputations precede you.
-There you go. -Why, thank you.
-That's nice to hear. -Uh, not in a positive way, I'm afraid.
translation.it: - Fa piacere. - Non in senso positivo, temo.

translation.en: Okay.
I understand the last time you were involved in something like this,
translation.it: L'ultima volta che eravate in una situazione simile,

translation.en: everybody died?
Well, that was not the Maharajah.
How's he doing now?
-[laughs] Okay. -Right.
The Colonel's still here, most of him, so there. That's good.
translation.it: Il colonnello è ancora qui, quasi intero. È positivo.

translation.en: Um, listen. Mr. Miller, I read your book, and--
translation.it: Il colonnello è ancora qui, quasi intero. È positivo. Sig. Miller, ho letto il libro…

translation.en: [Miller] Colonel, I wanna see all the security footage.
All the footage was wiped from the mainframe.
Yeah, 'cause it's an inside job.
Mademoiselle Joubert, we'll need your phone for a vocal analysis of the voice mail.
translation.it: Mademoiselle Joubert, ci serve il suo telefono per l'analisi vocale.

translation.en: Of course. Anything you need.
They're professional, no doubt. They were concise and brief on the phone.
translation.it: - Qualsiasi cosa. - Sono professionisti. Sono stati brevi e concisi.

translation.en: We also have reason to believe that the inside man was posing as an elephant handler.
translation.it: E crediamo che il complice si spacciasse per un addestratore di elefanti.

translation.en: You really wanna do suspects now, Mrs. Spitz?
translation.it: Vuole parlare di sospetti, sig.ra Spitz?

translation.en: -Sure. -[Miller] Fine.
How about this? Uh…
A husband and wife, one an NYPD almost-detective,
translation.it: Marito e moglie, lui quasi detective di New York,

translation.en: the other a hairdresser taking online classes.
translation.it: lei parrucchiera che fa corsi online.

translation.en: Together they run a private detective agency teetering on the edge of bankruptcy.
translation.it: Gestiscono un'agenzia investigativa sull'orlo della bancarotta.

translation.en: And if I were to hazard a guess, I'd say it's probably taking a toll on their marriage.
translation.it: Azzardando un'ipotesi, direi che il matrimonio è in crisi.

translation.en: Desperate to give validity to their failing business,
translation.it: Nel disperato tentativo di salvare l'attività

translation.en: Just chill out, please! Get this vest off me.
You all right?
[breathless] I need my vape.
-Okay. -[Delacroix] In my pocket there.
The right pocket.
-This? -No, no. Oh, no. That's your penis.
translation.it: - No… - Questo è il suo pene.

translation.en: -You got it. -[Susan] Okay, got it. Got it.
I don't think this is the best thing for someone who's been shot,
translation.it: Non le fa bene, le hanno sparato,

translation.en: but go for it.
Here comes Brooklyn.
-It stopped! -Oh!
Oh God!
Cut that damn thing off!
Step back, or this money goes.
I don't believe you.
How the hell do you do that without getting a concussion?

translation.en: God's gift!
He will never blink again.
translation.it: Non sbatterà mai più le palpebre.

translation.en: -[Audrey] Nick! -Yeah, we're coming, precious!
Let me handle this, please.
Perhaps… a mild concussion.
-Get the thing off! -We are all gonna blow up!
I don't know what to do!
[Nick] It's all good, babe!
Nicky Two Guns in the house!
Did I hit anything?
You got the detonator thingy, honey!
Okay, good! That's what I was aiming for!
Oh, my love.
The ring. The rings of love.
Yes. Okay. We're gonna use the guns for something else now, aren't we, bro?

translation.en: Smacked up your friends pretty good. You're next.

translation.en: What's up? What's up?
Okay.
Where you going? Babe!
Honey!
It's okay, baby! I got you! Just hang on!

translation.en: I must have missed the chapter on face-kicking.
translation.it: Forse ho saltato il capitolo sui calci in faccia.

translation.en: [Audrey] Oh my gosh.
[grunts] Come here.
It's time to make it rain, bitch.
translation.it: È ora di far piovere soldi, stronzo.

translation.en: [yelling] No!
Come to me!
Finish off the others.
Oh… Okay.
-[Delacroix] What is that? -That really killed the vibe.
[Audrey] Hey, Miller!
My husband was right. Your book sucked.
translation.it: Mio marito ha ragione. Il tuo libro fa schifo.

translation.en: She never misses.
I'm so sorry!
-Now you miss? -I'm sorry, baby! I'm sorry!
[screaming] Oh shit!
Goddamn! Are you aiming for me or him?
translation.it: Maledizione! Miri a me o a lui?

translation.en: Him, I promise! I promise!
-Just shoot him. Shoot him! -Shit!
-Okay. -[Nick] Shoot him!
Uh, I've come to the end of my rope, you know what I mean?
translation.it: Tesoro, mi sento con una corda al collo…

translation.en: My wheels are really turning right now. They're spinnin', my wheels.
translation.it: E comunque è una ruota che gira, lo sai.

translation.en: Never misses, huh?
Not everybody can be as good as you, I guess.
translation.it: Non si può essere tutti bravi come te.

translation.en: Enjoy the ride, Miller.
Oh my God.
-[Susan shrieks] -Get down!
-Oh! -Jeez!
Paris is very weird.
He's dead this time.
-He's so dead. -He is. It's done.
translation.it: - Stavolta è morto. - Stecchito. È fatta.

translation.en: How did you come up with that plan? How do you do that?
translation.it: Quando hai concepito quel piano? Come fai?

translation.en: -I have no idea-- -You're a genius.
translation.it: - Non lo so… - Sei un genio.

translation.en: It just kinda came out. Like, I just was like, what? My baby!
translation.it: È uscito così. Ti ho visto lì… indifeso!

translation.en: You are next-level! I would never think of anything that good.
translation.it: Sei eccezionale. Non ci avrei mai pensato!

translation.en: Thank you. I don't know what I did, and it was so scary.
translation.it: Non so cosa ho fatto ma ho avuto tanta paura.

translation.en: -What? -We're a team now, hmm?
-No. No. Get him off. Get him off. -Don't touch her. It's getting her upset.
translation.it: Levamelo di torno… - Non toccarla. La fa arrabbiare. - Stai indietro.

translation.en: -Back up. -Just back up.
translation.it: - Non toccarla. La fa arrabbiare. - Stai indietro.

translation.en: You did good, but just back up. Give us room. Thank you.
translation.it: Sei stato bravo, ma stai indietro. Facci spazio. Grazie.

translation.en: -Oh, babe. -It's all right. I love you, baby.
translation.it: - Amore. - Va tutto bene. Ti amo, piccola.

translation.en: That was just… It's kind of a beautiful Paris night besides that.

translation.en: Yeah.
Yes. Hey!
-[Colonel] Nick! Audrey! -Hey! You guys did it again! Oh!

translation.en: -Vik, I am so sorry about the money. -Yes, we apologize.

translation.en: It was a lot of money to throw away.
translation.it: Chiedi scusa. Hai buttato tanti soldi.

translation.en: I think Paris is gonna thank you from the bottom of their hearts.
translation.it: I parigini ti saranno molto grati.

translation.en: Don't worry about it. Just as long as none of my peeps got murked, yeah?

translation.en: [laughs] Apart from Mr. Lou.
Oh, yeah, that's true.
-[laughs] -Lou who, huh? [laughs]
Oh no. What happened to you? Why are you bleeding?

translation.en: Oh, no. It's… I'm not. It's henna.
translation.it: Oh, no, non è sangue. È l'henné.

translation.en: It must have smeared in tonight's commotion.
Oh, thank God. I'm sick. I can't take one more accident tonight.
translation.it: Grazie a Dio. Non avrei retto un altro dramma.

translation.en: No more blood, please.
translation.it: Basta sangue. Giuro che sembrava sangue.

translation.en: -I swear, I thought it was blood. -I am exhausted. Aren't you?
translation.it: Basta sangue. Giuro che sembrava sangue. Io sono esausta. Voi no?

translation.en: [Vik] Yeah.
-What are you muttering about right now? -Something doesn't make sense.
translation.it: Che cosa stai borbottando adesso? Stai borbottando.

translation.en: I'm sorry. It just doesn't make any sense.
translation.it: Mi dispiace, ma non ha alcun senso.

translation.en: Saira, I'm so sorry. What…
Did you just say you smeared your henna during tonight's commotion?
translation.it: Hai detto che l'henné ti si è sbaffato nel trambusto di stasera?

translation.en: That's right.
That's interesting.
[scoffs] Why is that interesting?
[Nick] Yes, why is that interesting?
You know, I never saw you during the welcome dance.
translation.it: Non ti ho vista al ballo di benvenuto.

translation.en: And then you just kind of showed up right after the elephant arrived.
translation.it: E poi ti sei presentata subito dopo l'arrivo dell'elefante.

translation.en: Yeah. I was… I was getting a drink. [laughs]
translation.it: Sì, ero andata a prendere da bere.

translation.en: Honey, I was a hairdresser, and I know a thing or two about dyes,
translation.it: Tesoro, ero parrucchiera e di colori me ne intendo.

translation.en: and once henna sets, it doesn't smear.
translation.it: Una volta seccato, l'henné non sbaffa.

translation.en: Sorry. I… I have no idea what you're talking about.
translation.it: Scusa. Non ho idea di cosa tu stia parlando.

translation.en: That wasn't blood that I saw on the elephant handler's robe.
translation.it: La macchia sulla divisa dell'addestratore non era sangue.

translation.en: It was henna.
And it was your henna that never had time to dry the night of the murder.
translation.it: Che non ha fatto in tempo ad asciugarsi la notte dell'omicidio.

translation.en: Oh my God! The sister did it!
translation.it: Oh mio Dio! È stata la sorella!

translation.en: Oh snap!
Come on. This is lunacy! You guys, haven't we done this already?
translation.it: Andiamo. È follia! Ragazzi, non ne abbiamo già parlato?

translation.en: I love my brother. I mean, what reason would I have to--
translation.it: Io adoro mio fratello. Cioè, per quale motivo dovrei…

translation.en: Maybe because your parents gave him the family business,
translation.it: Forse perché i tuoi genitori gli hanno dato l'azienda

translation.en: even though you're the smart one,
translation.it: anche se tu eri quella sveglia

translation.en: and he's the Jet Skiing rapper wannabe with no skill at all?
translation.it: e lui un rapper in moto d'acqua buono a nulla?

translation.en: No offense.
Some taken.
And isn't that the same reason you tried to kill him in Mumbai?
translation.it: E per quello hai cercato di ucciderlo a Mumbai?

translation.en: You!
Well, my parents were right about one thing.
translation.it: Beh, i miei avevano ragione su una cosa.

translation.en: If you need something done correctly,
translation.it: Se vuoi che una cosa sia fatta bene,

translation.en: you should just do it yourself.
-[Vik] Saira! -[Audrey gasps]
[Colonel] No!
Oh! This poor guy, honey! He's running out of arms!
Not in my town. Yeah! That's my bae!
translation.it: - Non nella mia città. - Sì! La mia ragazza.

translation.en: [sighs] Thank you, baby. I've got to just…
-'Sup! It's okay. Yeah. -[Colonel groans]
You… You did great, pal. You're my number one bodyguard.
translation.it: Sei stato grande. Sei la guardia del corpo numero uno.

translation.en: And not just 'cause the last one got smoked.
translation.it: E non perché l'ultima è andata.

translation.en: That Kwanzaa bonus better be off the hook this year.
translation.it: Sarà meglio che il bonus per Kwanzaa sia da capogiro.

translation.en: Hey, it's bionic arm time, bitch! Yeah?

translation.en: -Yeah? -Yeah!
[Susan] You're okay.
-How are you feeling, young man? -How are you doing?
-I'm okay. -Laurent is a special man. Aren't you?
translation.it: - Sto bene. - Laurent è un uomo speciale.

translation.en: We're gonna go to dinner once you get out of the hospital.
translation.it: E ceneremo insieme appena lo dimetteranno.

translation.en: Paris weaves its spell once again.
Feel better.
-All right. -[Vik] Should we tell them?
-Yes! [laughs] -Okay, guys. We decided to elope.
translation.it: Dovremmo dirglielo? Sì. Ragazzi, abbiamo deciso di fuggire.

translation.en: -That is the smart choice, always. -That's amazing.
Good for you guys.
Yeah, no family, but, um, I owe you guys my life.
translation.it: Sì, niente famiglia, ma credo di dovervi la vita.

translation.en: Oh, we're just happy you're both okay.
And really, honestly, thank you for giving us an adventure…
Yes.
…we are never going to forget.
-I guess we're even then. Peace out. -Peace out!
translation.it: - Sì. - Ora siamo pari. Pace e bene. Pace e bene.

translation.en: -Bye-bye. -Au revoir!
Sorry about your sister being a psycho, by the way.
translation.it: Mi dispiace per tua sorella psicotica.

translation.en: Ah, don't worry about it. She's a real piece of shit.
translation.it: Tranquillo, è una stronza di prima.

translation.en: -Yes, she was. -[both] Yeah.
-[Nick] Okay. -Honey, I'm really ready to go home.

translation.en: -Yes, I am too. -I'm really ready.
translation.it: - Io lo stesso. - Non vedo l'ora.

translation.en: We have to do one thing first.
-Trust me. Trust me. All right? -What? Okay. Okay. Okay.
-[Nick] Check on the Colonel. You okay? -[Audrey] Colonel!

translation.en: You're not losing this arm?
translation.it: Colonnello! Non perderà il braccio, vero?

translation.en: [Nick] Click it. Click it. We did it.
Now we are forever locked up together for the rest of our lives.
translation.it: Ora saremo per sempre agganciati, per il resto delle nostre vite.

translation.en: I'd never wanna be locked up with anybody else.

translation.en: Me neither, sweetheart. You are--
translation.it: Lo stesso per me, tesoro. Tu sei…

translation.en: -[man] The Shitz! -What?
[chuckles] Nick and Audrey Shitz!
-The helicopter guy? What the-- -What are you doing here?
translation.it: - Il tizio dell'elicottero? Che… - Che ci fa qui?

translation.en: Take it. Take the phone!
Hello?
[Vik] Of course we're not even. Take my helicopter!
translation.it: No che non siamo pari. Prendete l'elicottero!

translation.en: Go anywhere! Have a honeymoon you deserve! And a little cash!
translation.it: Andate dove volete, fate la luna di miele. Con un po' di contanti.

translation.en: -What? -Cash? A bag of--
-Are you for real? -[Nick laughs]
translation.it: Fa sul serio? Oddio, guarda. Oddio…

translation.en: -Oh my gosh. Look! Oh my-- -Well, yeah.
translation.it: Fa sul serio? Oddio, guarda. Oddio… Credo che bastino, grazie.

translation.en: That seems to be enough money. Thank you.
[Vik] Just ten million! Don't spend it all in one place!
But if you do spend it all, just sell the briefcase.

translation.en: It's worth three million!
-It's dinosaur leather! -My God!
translation.it: - È pelle di dinosauro! - Mio Dio!

translation.en: Dinosaur? We can't take this! Come on!
You know what? We will take this. Thank you.
[Vik] Now you two keep busting nuts! Maharajah out!

translation.en: What's the first thing you wanna do? -I wanna kiss you! -Ah!
translation.it: - Qual è la prima cosa che vuoi fare? - Baciarti!

translation.en: I can't believe this!
-My baby. -My darling.
The honeymoon we always deserved.
translation.it: La luna di miele che meritiamo.

translation.en: -Exactly. -Finally.
Can you believe how lucky we are?
[American accent] You liking those drinks?
-What-- -Are you shitz-ing us right now?
Hand me the bag.
What? The, uh--
-Bag. Hand me the bag. -You want this?
-That's not a problem. -Give him the bag.
[Nick] What happened to the accent?
It's back in Jersey.
Let's just have a civilized conversation.
[pilot] See you never, Shitzes!
translation.it: A mai più, teste di Spritz!

translation.en: -Oh my God! Where did he-- -Oh my God! Oh-- Oh my--
